bool ConverterCopyFile ( const char *  oldFile,
const char *  newFile,
bool  overwrite = false 
)

Copies a file.

Parameters:
oldFile The name of the file to copy.
newFile The name of the new file.
overwrite A flag indicating if an existing file should be deleted prior to the copy.
Returns:
True if the file was copied.

void ConverterCreateAndAddParentArrayGenericDataHeader ( affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader &  hdr,
std::string  arrayID,
std::wstring  arrayBarcode 
)

Creates and adds the array set GenericDataHeader as a parent to the hdr parameter. The arrayID member will be set as the affymetrix-array-id value.

Parameters:
hdr The GenericDataHeader that will receive the array set parent header.
arrayID. The array ID. (physcial array ID).
arrayBarcode. The array barcode.
